title: Task 64

question.text: What does the sentence tell us about Maria's work habits?

answers.answer: She works from home and has meetings.
answers.feedback: This option is incorrect because there is no mention of Maria working from home, only from her office.
This option is incorrect because the sentence specifically states most of the time, which implies that there are times when she is not in her office.

answers.answer: She is usually in meetings a lot.
answers.feedback: This option is incorrect because it does not acknowledge that Maria also spends a significant amount of time working from her office, not just in meetings.

answers.answer: She usually works from her office but often has meetings.

dialogue.text: She works from her office most of the time, but she's also in meetings a lot.

description: The sentence describes where Maria usually works and adds that she has meetings often.
